mapper.select: SELECT SBJ FROM DPSS_TBL ORDER BY SBJ

SELECT SEQ, SBJ, CONTENT, STLEMPTYP1, STLEMPTYP2, STLEMPTYP3, STLEMPTYP4, STLNM1, STLNM2, STLNM3, STLNM4, STLORDR1, STLORDR2, STLORDR3, STLORDR4, CNSTEMPTYP1, CNSTEMPTYP2, CNSTEMPTYP3, CNSTEMPTYP4, CNSTEMPTYP5, CNSTNM1, CNSTNM2, CNSTNM3, CNSTNM4, CNSTNM5, CNSTORDR1, CNSTORDR2, CNSTORDR3, CNSTORDR4, CNSTORDR5, MODID, TO_CHAR(MODDT, 'YYYYMMDD') AS MODDT FROM DPSS_TBL ORDER BY SBJ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DPSS_TBL VALUES ( DPSS_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{SBJ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CONTENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLEMPTYP1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLEMPTYP2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLEMPTYP3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLEMPTYP4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLNM1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLNM2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLNM3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLNM4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTEMPTYP1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTEMPTYP2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTEMPTYP3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTEMPTYP4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTEMPTYP5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTNM1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTNM2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTNM3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTNM4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTNM5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{MODID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{MODID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{STLORDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLORDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLORDR3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{STLORDR4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTORDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTORDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTORDR3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTORDR4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{CNSTORDR5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: Update DPSS_TBL SET SBJ = #{SBJ, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CONTENT = #{CONTENT, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLEMPTYP1 = #{STLEMPTYP1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLEMPTYP2 = #{STLEMPTYP2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLEMPTYP3 = #{STLEMPTYP3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLEMPTYP4 = #{STLEMPTYP4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLNM1 = #{STLNM1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLNM2 = #{STLNM2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLNM3 = #{STLNM3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLNM4 = #{STLNM4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLORDR1 = #{STLORDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLORDR2 = #{STLORDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLORDR3 = #{STLORDR3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , STLORDR4 = #{STLORDR4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTEMPTYP1 = #{CNSTEMPTYP1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTEMPTYP2 = #{CNSTEMPTYP2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTEMPTYP3 = #{CNSTEMPTYP3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTEMPTYP4 = #{CNSTEMPTYP4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTEMPTYP5 = #{CNSTEMPTYP5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTNM1 = #{CNSTNM1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTNM2 = #{CNSTNM2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTNM3 = #{CNSTNM3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTNM4 = #{CNSTNM4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTNM5 = #{CNSTNM5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTORDR1 = #{CNSTORDR1, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTORDR2 = #{CNSTORDR2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTORDR3 = #{CNSTORDR3, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTORDR4 = #{CNSTORDR4, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CNSTORDR5 = #{CNSTORDR5, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODID = #{MODID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MODDT = SYSDATE WHERE SEQ = #{SEQ}
